text: It's time for the playbook again. In this part of the playbook, part 10, I'd like you to find strategies 2, 3, 4 and 5 that we've dealt with in part 10. So, I want you to go into the E-mini S&P, the German Bund Tenure, the WTI Nimex Oil and the Eurodollar FX and I want you to find firstly the open drive, the initial balance breakout, the consolidation breakout and the wide initial balance distribution. Remember, take your time, understand these strategies one by one. Don't worry about rushing through this, that's not important. What's important is that A, you understand the strategy, B, you understand why you're employing the strategy, and C, you learn how to execute the strategy within the best context.
